title: Propositional Material Base
description: A material base B = <L_B, |~_B> for propositional NMMS. The language L_B contains atomic sentences and the consequence relation |~_B is a set of sequents over L_B.

language.description: The atomic language L_B — a sorted list of atomic sentence strings.

consequences.description: The base consequence relation |~_B — a list of sequent pairs.

antecedent.description: Left side (Gamma) of the sequent. May be empty for theorems.

consequent.description: Right side (Delta) of the sequent. May be empty for incompatibilities.

annotations.description: Optional natural-language descriptions for atoms. Keys are atom names, values are descriptions.
